reviews.review:
流程很短，不过真的是好游戏。
越往后越感觉压抑，伴随着炮塔机器人的扫射以及GlaDOS不停说话的机械音总感觉心里发毛
凭着自己的摸索慢慢前进，最后销毁掉GlaDOS的所有核心回到地面，就好像真的从地底回到了地面上一样长舒一口气（虽然马上又被拖回去吃蛋糕）
The Cake is a lie!
通关的想法还是赛博朋克2077里德拉曼的彩蛋激发的...
good game

1/10

M E U  D E U S, esse jogo é do krl, pena q ele é curto demais, mas... ainda tem o 2 pra jogar e concerteza eu vo zerar ele e faze review dele, mano, esse jogo é mind game pra krl (é um jogo de puzzle krl q q c queria), e ele te prende cada vez mais quando vc passa de level pq vc fica tipo "NUUUUOSSAA SO MUITO FODA MANO" dai vc fica nesse looping eterno até vc zera o game, no começo ele é bem estranho pq sempre tem umas camera na sala te observando e vc fica meio desconfortavel tipo "quem é essa porra q ta me vendo, VC KÉ ME MATA???", pelo q eu entendi do jogo vc é uma pessoa q ta sendo usada pra testar essa arma q lança uns portal muito loko, dai dps eles te MATA, mais como vc é foda pra krl, vc escapa da armadilha, dai dps vc tem q escapar daquele lugar por sua conta propria, eles sempre tentando te matar, (como deu pra perceber essa review tem spoilers ent,,, espero q vc tenha zerado o jogo antes de ler isso :3 ) dps de todas as merda q vc passo vc vai parar nessa sala q tem a robo mãe, ela fica putassa contigo, vc mata ela, e tem o seu presente no final o "the cake" e a musiquinha :3, cara eu comprei esse jogo pq eu joguei o começo do 2 e n entendi porra nenhuma, dai eu fiquei tipo "porra vot q compra o 1 pq eu n sei oq ta acontecendo" fui ver o preço, eu n tinha dinheiro pra comprar ;-; mais... calma la, na maioria das vezes quando vc tem um jogo q tem numa bundle com outros jogos fica mais barato doq ele separado, hmmmmmmmmmmm (analise), DEU CERTO, fui la comprei o game e gg, pena q agr só tenho 23 centavos ;------; ent é isso, essa foi minha jornada muito foda desse game, jogo do krl, vale a pena pra porra jogar ele, e eu nunca do uma nota no final da review pq eu esqueço mai esse jogo é 10/10, é isso, bye :3




































































(HALF LIFE IS COMING SOON)

Super sick game!!! I sadly switched to a Macbook before i could beat it but i still LOVE this game and it's puzzles. They're challenging while still not being crazy. I also love how it slowly introduces new things for you to toy with.

Buen juego, en cuanto historia no es nada del otro mundo, no es mala pero tampoco es una historia que te dejara marcado de por vida, dejando de lado lo anterior es uno de los mejores juegos de puzzles que he jugado y ademas dura muy poco, esto puede ser bueno o malo dependiendo de como se vea, lo recomiendo al 100%.
so much better than playing sudoku over and over
game good, good game. buy now

What is a hyper unique premise, kind of gets frustrating after a while, despite it's 3 hour playtime. 

The concept of the portal is interesting, but there are certain segments that are a little frustrating. It's not a calm puzzle game, and it's not a fast action game, and while that might be good for some people, trying to fit through a gap while trying to create portals mid jump at high speeds and then missing it by an inch, so that your character stops all momentum, or dropping off an edge because of looping up weird from a portal on the ground, it just adds up and gets a little annoying.

I can imagine this would be groundbreaking for it's time (depsite it's short game-time), gaming wasn't as strong back then, but nowadays there is a lot of competition and this just feels unremarkable in 2021 (which is when someone would buy it)

If you really like puzzles, you'll probably like it, I like puzzles moderately, but in the end, only get this on sale.

Portal is a decently good and easy game where getting all the achievements is actually moderately easy so you can boast to your friends and family on your Avg. game completion rate and your Perfect Game rate.

Portal is basically a Tech demo for the portal mechanic. The game took me around 3 hours to beat, the achievements on the other hand are actually very difficult to obtain, since they requiere a huge amount of game knowledge and a clear comprehension of the portal mechanic and its potential.

If the game is up for sale i absolutely recomend you to try it out (especially if you obtain it through the orange box or the portal pack, since you basically obtain it for free)
mola pero spoiler matas a tu madre

Amazing game. Played it so much back when I was on Console. Unfortunately when you play it enough, its too easy and its like walking in a straight line xD
I managed to complete all 19 tests in less than 1 hour (excluding boss part).
Anyways, I highly recommend this game and the 2nd game for all you Portal Lovers out there! Especially the people who haven't even heard of Portal. PLAY IT!!!

My favorite Valve game, so some of this is bias.
100% would recommend to people who just got into gaming, and love problem-solving games. And to people who played games for a long time, and want a break from the fast-pace fps games. Portal is a chill relaxing fps. I'm not going to spoil anything, because i want for others to find out stuff.
But you most likely already know the entire story of portal and portal 2. But still will always recommend to new people in the gaming community.
